root.limiter: MO OPCOND OPCONDMAP OMLSTAT RSLSTAT /any/ CNFG /any/ \n{2,}
root.HEADER: RADIO X-CEIVER ADMINISTRATION BTS STATUS DATA

OPCONDMAP.b1: MO is degraded or not operational due to internal TRXC fault.
OPCONDMAP.b2: MO is degraded or not operational due to SW upgrade.
OPCONDMAP.b3: MO is degraded or not operational due to synchronization problems.
OPCONDMAP.b4: MO is degraded or not operational due to frame synchronization problems.
OPCONDMAP.b5: MO is degraded or not operational due to communication loss detected for CS traffic.
OPCONDMAP.b6: MO is degraded or not operational due to communication loss detected for PS traffic.
OPCONDMAP.b7: MO is degraded or not operational due to diversity error.
OPCONDMAP.b8: MO is degraded or not operational due to RX path imbalance.
